Member Enumeration Documentation

enum AbstractPredictiveInputBox::PredBitmapId
 

Specifies the bitmaps used by the input-boxes.

Enumerator:
UpDownArrowBitmapId  Bitmap for displaying the up/down arrow.
DownArrowBitmapId  Bitmap for displaying the down arrow.
UpArrowBitmapId  Bitmap for displaying the Up arrow.
SelectBitmapId  Obsolete - Bitmap for indicating the selection in pinyin.

enum AbstractPredictiveInputBox::PredFontId

void AbstractPredictiveInputBox::OnGetFocus (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if the control gets the focus. When a Control has the focus, all messages of the type MC_FOCUS are forwarded to this Control.
